divs: Sighting DetailsI was lying on a beach on the north east of Mallorca, Spain Cala Torta, feelingrelaxed and calm. I was looking at the sky and suddenly I saw what I thought wasa small private plane. The sun shone on its metallic surface as it flew by forabout 30 seconds. I thought I was about to hear the noise of the plane, when itsuddenly vanished into thin air. I didnB4t fade away into the distance, but it completely dissapeared in a fraction ofa second. For a moment I thought it could have been a meteorological balloon,but it couldnB4t have dissapeared like that.
